title: Asphalt 7: Heat v1.1.1
description:

RACE ACROSS THE GLOBE
Gear up to race on 15 tracks set in real cities around the world, including brand new tracks in Hawaii, Paris, London, Miami and Rio.

CHALLENGE THE WORLD
The completely revamped multiplayer lets you take on up to 5 of your friends locally or online. Keep track of whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the best with the new Asphalt Tracker that lets you compare stats, show off achievements and challenge rivals. You can also find new online opponents with the matchmaking system. Practice haHit the speed of heat in the newest, fastest, most visually stunning edition of the famed Asphalt series.

Install APK 
Copy 'com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftA7HM' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb/' (If you have installed v1.0.6 no need to download main obb 1.0.6)
Copy 'patch.1110.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftA7HM.obb' file to 'sdcard/Android/Obb/com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftA7HM' folder
Launch the game (Run online@ 1st run)
